name: HempCoin
description: Launched in 2014, the HempCoin (THC) was built on the source code of Komodo (KMD) for the Hemp Industry. The vision for THC is to help facilitate secure transactional relationships between farmers, distributors, and consumers. In 2Q-2019, THC is leveraging the Komodo Platform to build HempTRAC using UTXO.
notice: We have received reports of impeded withdrawals of THC on p2pb2b. Please perform your own due diligence.
